item.title: Halsey on Learning From Sydney Sweeney on ‘Americana’ and Creating Her Own New Series: “Really Cool to Be Part of a Project I Don’t Face”

item.title: Seth Rogen and Rose Byrne Hope to Complete the ‘Neighbors’ Reunion and Bring Zac Efron On ‘Platonic’

item.title: Join Us for WIRED’s AI Power Summit
item.description: On September 15, WIRED is gathering a panel of leaders across technology, politics, and media to tell you everything you need to know about the future of generative AI.
